snippet: It may look as if Britain is trying to defend AstraZeneca from a hostile takeover by Pfizer, but in the end, market forces should be allowed to prevail.
lead_paragraph: It may look as if Britain is trying to defend AstraZeneca from a hostile takeover by Pfizer, but in the end, market forces should be allowed to prevail.

headline.main: Letting the Market Decide on Pfizer-AstraZeneca Deal
headline.print_headline: Letting the Market Decide on Pfizer-AstraZeneca Deal
